I occasionally get asked to talk about insects as food and feed in the media. Here is a (non-exhaustive) collection of media appearances I have made:

### Media

Sometimes I get asked to do media stuff. Here are some if you are interested:

#### 2022

[RNZ article](https://www.rnz.co.nz/news/country/466094/insect-protein-a-climate-friendly-alternative-to-meat-researchers-say) - Commentary on a recent paper on insect protein as a climate friendly alternative to meat

[RNZ Morning Rural News](https://www.rnz.co.nz/national/programmes/ruralnews/audio/2018839742/morning-rural-news-for-28-april-2022) - Commentary on a recent paper on insect protein as a climate friendly alternative to meat

[bFM: Tomorrow's World](https://95bfm.com/bcast/the-buzz-about-hexacycle-w-neil-birrell-june-27-2022) - Interview about black soldier fly organic waste treatment

#### 2021

[TVNZ](https://www.tvnz.co.nz/shows/bug-hunter-cooking-with-insects) - Bug Hunter: Cooking with Insects. I got to work along side my wonderfully talented friend and lab mate [Morgane Merien](https://morganemerien.com/)

[Stuff, NZ](https://www.stuff.co.nz/national/126470505/new-zealanders-open-to-eating-insects-study-finds) - An article on some of my research findings

[RNZ, Afternoons with Jesse Mulligan](https://www.rnz.co.nz/national/programmes/afternoons/audio/2018813997/appetite-for-insects-in-new-zealand) - Interview about my research findings

[Magic talk, Rural Today](https://omny.fm/shows/rural-today-catch-up-podcast/playlists/podcast/embed?style=cover) - rural news piece on my research findings

[Magic Talk, AM show](https://omny.fm/shows/the-am-show-catchup-podcast/playlists/the-am-show-catchup-podcast/embed?style=cover)

[Ready steady learn, bFM](https://95bfm.com/bcast/ready-steady-learn-w-neil-birrell-september-21-2021) - ways insects can help reduce our carbon emissions

#### 2019

[RNZ, Saturday Morning with Kim Hill](https://www.rnz.co.nz/national/programmes/saturday/audio/2018732320/wrangling-maggots-to-reduce-food-waste) - An interview on work in Kerala, India

[Green Desk: bFM](https://95bfm.com/bcast/the-green-desk-september-17-2019) - Interview about black soldier fly stuff
